meanings.definition: A type of German sausage typically made from pork.
meanings.sent1: The bratwurst was delicious at the Oktoberfest.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a bratwurst with sauerkraut at the food festival.
meanings.sent3: The bratwurst told a joke to the hot dog, and they both laughed.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling bratwurst filled the air, tempting everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The juicy bratwurst sizzled on the grill, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A grilled or fried sausage served in a bun.
meanings.sent1: At the barbecue, I enjoyed a tasty bratwurst in a bun.
meanings.sent2: The food truck offered a variety of bratwurst options in buns.
meanings.sent3: The bratwurst in the bun did a little dance on the picnic table.
meanings.sent4: The bratwurst in the bun was a flavorful explosion in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling bratwurst in the bun was the highlight of the cookout.
